name: Naga Royal Guard
description: Elite serpentine warriors sworn to protect Naga royalty. Armed with enchanted tridents that deliver devastating splash attacks.

abilities.name: Impaling Strike
abilities.description: Thrusts trident forward, dealing 200% damage and pinning the target for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Tidal Stance
abilities.description: Enters a defensive stance, increasing armor by 8 and reflecting 20% of melee damage for 6 seconds.
